Termitron/Trinity/Nightlight

Termitron couldn't avoind Stiller's arrow and it stuck in his leg, 
but he could avoid McGowan's, Virgo's and Alba's attack; after that 
he fired  5 shots against McGowan, 10 against Virgo and 5 against 
Alba.


Trinity moved quickly but in inspite of that she was struck by one of 
paralyzing darts, she dificulty could move "I have to help my 
friends" said Trinity "I must help my friends..."


Nightlight moved quickly and she fired 25 energy-balls against Depp
